name: Yandere Runner (7 Deadly Sins Series)
description:
This is the fifth game in a series of 7 games each based on one of the 7 deadly sins, this is the game based on the sin of Envy.

Yandere Runner is a Runner type mini-game where you play as Yamazaki Rin, a yandere girl who was asked to kill everyone in her school by her love interest, and so that’s what she does.

This mini-game is inspired by the “Mall of the Spook” mini-game from Spooky’s Jump scare Mansion and is a recreation of my first ever game, The Night’s Genocide.

Made with Godot 3.4

CONTROLS :

-Arrows to go up and down.

-A to proceed through menus.

-N to unlock XXXXXXX in main menu.
